name: Republic of South
startIntroPart2: Now we have came to the world to show everyone our nation's power!
declaringWar: Now we are ready to expand our domains. You shall be our next conquest!
attacked: We shall not loose our freedom!
defeated: Our nation have failed, may God bring us to glory someday.
introduction: We appreciate any help we get to sustain our nation.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
